typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	File as string,
	Directory as string,
	ExecutionDate as timestamp,
	RunId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StructuredFile
StructuredFile derive(HASH = md5(columns()),
		ExecutionStatus = 'INSERT',
		ExecutionCreatedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionModifiedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionLogId = $RunId) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[($File)],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Current
